function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential exposure to contagious diseases through handling physical photographs and materials","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases if proper hygiene and precautions are not taken","Mitigation":"Use of protective gloves, regular sanitization, and limited physical handling of materials","Technologies":"Digital scanning and analysis of photographs to minimize physical handling","People":"Researchers, analysts, and anyone handling the physical photographs","Owner":"Research institution, health and safety team"},{"Description":"Close contact during group analysis and categorization of photographs may lead to disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases in a close group setting","Mitigation":"Utilizing virtual meetings, maintaining social distance, and implementing remote collaboration tools","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, collaboration software, and remote access tools","People":"Research team, analysts, and collaborators involved in the categorization process","Owner":"Research institution, project manager, and IT support team"},{"Description":"Unclear protocols for handling and coding of physical materials may increase the risk of cross-contamination","Impact":"Potential for mislabeling, mishandling, and cross-contamination of physical materials","Mitigation":"Establishing clear protocols, training on proper handling procedures, and regular auditing of coding processes","Technologies":"Barcode scanning, RFID tagging, and digital inventory management systems","People":"Researchers, coders, and anyone involved in handling and coding physical materials","Owner":"Research institution, quality assurance team, and technology department"}]}
